root.name: Lionheart: King's Crusade
root.description: OverviewLionheart: King's Crusade is a Real-Time strategy game developed by Neocore Games. It was developed by the same team who made King Arthur: A Role-playing Wargame and is built on the same engine. The game loosely follows King Richard I's adventures in the Middle East during the 12th century. Players can take part in two separate campaigns; The Crusaders under Richard I or The Saracens under Saladin. Lionheart also features online multiplayer.
